reviews.review: its a really fun game that doesnt get boring atleast in my case
la baja q no tenga competitivo, si no te corre este juego dedicate a brawlhalla movile
classic of the best of all time
If you do not enjoy this game, your either very clueless about how CS works or you are just hanging out in the bad servers.
Still a thing not good as 1.6 though....
fun game, its like if Gmod and Counter-Strike had a child.
cock and balls and dick and nuts
It's fun and plus toxic players that you can destroy easily because they are nobodys :)

Dang!! This old,
and i still play it.
got it for gmod but cool game i guess 8/10

esta bueno para los que no pueden jugar al go y no quieren jugar al 1.6, por ejemplo a mi no me gusta el 1.6 se me hace tosco pero es buen juego no lo discuto pero entre el 1.6 y el source prefiero el source mas que nada tiene mejores cosas en mi opinion, mejor comunidad, no tan toxica como la del 1.6, es toxica? si pero no tanto aparte que la DK aca esta rotisima, mejor gameplay me gusta mas como se juega aca que en el 1.6, mejores fisicas hablo especialmente de las granadas que no son pedazos de cartones re duros son granadas ahora
despite being old, its very good
This game is good for target practice before joining any MMOFPS lobbies out there, if I say so myself.
great game i got it for garrys mod but i tried the game and holy this game its honestly a really good game if you got it for garrys mod then try the game out
Great for If your in an area with out internet the bots are generally ok
